name: surfui
description: Surf UI is an lightweight CSS framework, it's fork from bootstrap and simplify bootstrap.

scripts.build: sass ./scss/index.scss ./dist/surfui.css && sass ./scss/index.scss ./dist/surfui.min.css --style compressed && sass ./scss/surfui.core.scss ./dist/surfui.core.css && sass ./scss/surfui.core.scss ./dist/surfui.core.min.css --style compressed && sass ./scss/surfui.base.scss ./dist/surfui.base.css && sass ./scss/surfui.base.scss ./dist/surfui.base.min.css --style compressed

author: icsd
